rooms.description: A spacious, minimalistic entrance hall that adheres to Brutalist design principles with raw concrete finishes and exposed structure.
A large open-plan living room designed for social gatherings, featuring robust concrete elements and minimalistic decor in line with Brutalist aesthetics.
Dedicated space for fitness equipment, with reinforced floors and raw finishes, located near the entrance to ensure quick access.
Functional kitchen space complemented by an adjacent dining area, incorporating exposed concrete and large windows for natural light.
Sole bedroom designed with ample storage, robust structure and a direct view towards the courtyard in accordance with Vastu principles promoting prosperity and peace.
Additional bedroom space for guests, designed to be functional yet minimalistic.
Essential bathroom adjoining the master and guest bedrooms. The use of raw concrete textures is balanced with modern fixtures.

openings.description: Large windows to allow ample natural light, following Vastu guidelines for the eastern wall.

rooms.description: This bedroom provides additional space for the children, incorporating storage and a view towards the western direction for balanced energy as per Vastu.
A dedicated library with ample shelving, comfortable seating, and abundant natural light. The room is oriented to the northern side for a conducive study environment.
A private balcony adjoining the master bedroom that connects with the rooftop terrace via an internal staircase. Designed with raw concrete and minimal detailing.

openings.description: Strategically placed windows to enhance natural lighting and maintain privacy.

rooms.description: A spacious terrace designed for relaxation and social gatherings, featuring a pergola with raw concrete finishes. The layout respects Vastu principles by providing open space in the north-west corner.
